hero.title: Performance, punctuality and efficiency every day.
hero.description: Specialized in parcel delivery and press distribution, ZK Concept runs optimized, reliable routes that meet sector requirements.

services.title: Our services
services.description: High-performance, structured and reliable logistics solutions designed for punctuality, efficiency and operational continuity.

why.title: Built for companies that require speed, control and reliability.
why.description: With proven organization and an experienced team, ZK Concept delivers efficiency, punctuality and operational stability.

item1.title: Clear operational organization
item1.text: Our processes reduce field friction, keep routes smooth and maintain consistent service quality, even during peak demand.

item2.title: Reliable on-time execution
item2.text: Every mission is monitored with rigor, from departure to delivery, to meet schedule commitments and quality standards.

item3.title: Continuous steering and monitoring
item3.text: We analyze performance, adjust plans and coordinate resources to ensure stability, control and responsiveness over time.

item4.title: Experienced team
item4.text: Our team combines field experience and operational discipline to meet demanding logistics requirements.

bottomCta.title: Ready to optimize your logistics operations?
bottomCta.description: ZK Concept supports businesses in parcel delivery and press distribution with reliability, punctuality and efficiency. Let's discuss your project and set up the right solution for your needs.

serviceTemplate.heroDescription: Clear, structured and reliable execution tailored to your operational requirements.
serviceTemplate.interestedDescription: Need delivery, distribution or logistics coordination? Send your request through our forms for a fast response and a solution adapted to your activity.

parcel.title: Parcel delivery
parcel.description: ZK Concept ensures fast and reliable parcel delivery across Belgium. Backed by years of experience with major players, we guarantee punctuality, process compliance and consistent service quality.

optimizedRoutes.title: Optimized routes
optimizedRoutes.text: Each route is prepared according to zones, delivery windows and field constraints to reduce idle time and maintain a reliable pace.

tracking.title: Tracking and traceability
tracking.text: We apply rigorous parcel tracking with clear procedures at every step to ensure transparency, control and service quality.

reliability.title: Operational reliability
reliability.text: Our organization absorbs variable volumes while maintaining punctuality, consistency and customer satisfaction over time.

press.title: Press distribution
press.description: We handle early-morning newspaper and magazine distribution with precision and consistency. Structured organization including sorting, preparation and route management ensures punctual and compliant execution.

preparation.title: Preparation and sorting
preparation.text: Publications are prepared and organized upstream to ensure efficient routing and reduce distribution errors.

morningExecution.title: Morning execution
morningExecution.text: Deliveries are carried out within strict time windows, with precise control to meet distributor and publisher requirements.

dailyConsistency.title: Daily consistency
dailyConsistency.text: Our method ensures stable, compliant distribution day after day with consistent quality levels.

logistics.title: Logistics management and coordination
logistics.description: ZK Concept handles route planning, driver coordination and full operational follow-up. Our independent structure ensures continuity, responsiveness and stability, even in demanding environments.

routePlanning.title: Route planning
routePlanning.text: We structure flows and itineraries to ensure coherent execution, reduce delays and optimize resources.

teamCoordination.title: Team coordination
teamCoordination.text: Driver and field coordination is monitored continuously to quickly adapt to changes and maintain operational continuity.

performanceTracking.title: Performance monitoring
performanceTracking.text: Global operations monitoring helps identify improvements, strengthen mission reliability and ensure service stability.

common.detailsPlaceholder: Describe your constraints, timelines and objectives.
common.consent: I agree to be contacted by ZK Concept regarding this request.

hero.title: Let's build a reliable, long-term collaboration.
hero.description: Field performance, rigorous execution and operational support for your logistics activities.

form.title: Work together
form.description: Fill out this form to describe your logistics needs. Our team will quickly come back with a clear proposal.
form.success: Thank you, your request has been sent.

hero.title: Get a clear estimate for your logistics needs.
hero.description: Field performance, rigorous execution and operational support for your logistics activities.

form.title: Request a quote
form.description: Fill out this detailed form to receive an estimate adapted to your volumes, areas and operational constraints.
form.success: Thank you, your quote request has been sent.

hero.title: Contact ZK Concept.
hero.description: Let's discuss your logistics project and find the best solution together.

form.description: Send us your request and our team will reply quickly.
form.success: Thank you, your message has been sent.
form.subject: Subject
form.responseNote: We will get back to you as soon as possible.

imprint.title: Imprint
imprint.description: Information collected on this site is limited to data entered in contact, quote and collaboration forms.

legalNotice.title: Legal notice
legalNotice.description1: This website presents ZK Concept activities in parcel delivery, press distribution and logistics coordination.
legalNotice.description2: Personal data processed through this site only comes from forms voluntarily completed by users.

privacy.title: Privacy policy
privacy.paragraph1: ZK Concept only collects information necessary to process requests sent through website forms: name, company, email, phone and need details.
privacy.paragraph2: This data is used exclusively to respond to requests, establish commercial contact and ensure operational follow-up. It is never sold or rented to third parties.
privacy.paragraph3: The website does not use hidden personal data collection for profiling purposes. Information is voluntarily provided by users when filling out a form.
privacy.paragraph4: You can request access, correction or deletion of your data at any time at: zakaria@zkconcept.be.
privacy.paragraph5: In case of major updates to this policy, the revision date on this page will be updated.

tempMails.title: Temp Mails Preview
tempMails.description: This page displays the HTML templates currently used for email sending. Any visual update here also impacts real emails sent by /api/contact.
